== Main Inclusion Report for skanlite ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/skanlite/]]</nowiki>; available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Needed by Kubuntu to support scanning
0. ''Security:''
** <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=skanlite|CVE entries]]</nowiki>: None
** <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=skanlite|Secunia history]]</nowiki>: None
** Does not run as root 
** Network activity: does not open ports or handle incoming data
** Does not directly (not through a library) process binary (video, audio, etc) or structured (PDF, etc) data 
** No known source code review performed
0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Always works out of the box without configuration 
** No debconf questions 
** Not in Debian
** <nowiki>[[http://websvn.kde.org/trunk/extragear/graphics/skanlite/|Upstream]]</nowiki> is vigorous/calm
** <nowiki>[[https://bugs.kde.org/buglist.cgi?query_format=specific&order=relevance+desc&bug_status=__open__&product=Skanlite|Upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>: No critical bugs
** Hardware: Does not deal directly with hardware.
** No test suite included
0. ''UI standards:''
** User-visible strings are internationalized using standard gettext system 
** .pot is built
** End user application, has .desktop file
0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant
** Does not build any libraries
** Packaging system: cdbs (using kde4/cmake)
** Patch system: quilt
0. ''Dependencies:''
** kdelibs5, in main
** libksane, in main
0. ''Maintenance:''
** Simple package, should need a fairly low amount of maintenance
** Kubuntu team are responsible for maintenance
0. ''Background information:''
** The general purpose and context of the package is very clear from the package's debian/control file.
** Upstream call it Skanlite
0. ''Internationalization:''
** Translatable, current version contains translations for 32 languages
